resources.string: Password too short, enter minimum 6 characters!
Authentication failed, check your email and password or sign up
We just need your registered Email Id to send you password reset instructions.
Erevu, We are a question and answer platform. users gain points when there answers/question get voted up. Remember, users with high points enjoy more privileges on the platform.
Erevu lets you get the satisfaction of helping other people with useful information and exchanging ideas. Remember, the more questions you answer the more votes you are likely to earn
Erevu discussion forums lets you get more feedback on a specific subject through group chat and push notifications in your inbox when someone answers a question you posted.
You can easly find an answer by searching for it because chances of it being asked before is high. Remember to vote up a question/answer if you find it useful! & have fun gaining knowledge.
To see the welcome slider again, goto Settings -> apps -> welcome slider -> clear data

We are a platform that helps households & companies nationwide to find top rated, quality assured local service providers. We help individuals & businesses utilize internet to find experts they want & services they need.
Attract your customers by providing as much information about your service as possible
